lead_paragraph: Residents fled as insurgents advanced on the city after capturing the nearby Khanabad district.

byline.contributor: Najim Rahim reported from Kunduz, and Fahim Abed from Kabul, Afghanistan. Rod Nordland contributed reporting from Cairo.
byline.original: By NAJIM RAHIM and FAHIM ABED

headline.print_headline: Afghan Troops Hold Off Taliban in Kunduz
headline.main: Afghan Troops Hold Off the Taliban in Kunduz

snippet: Residents fled as insurgents advanced on the city after capturing the nearby Khanabad district....
abstract: Afghan military narrowly thwarts Taliban attempt to take over city of Kunduz, retaking captured district of Khanabad from insurgents.
